English: Tell me, he will preach on what ?

Lingala: Sakina : Akoteya LILOBA ya bolingo mpe bomoko
English: He will preach THE WORLD of love and unity
I see that there will be a lot of joy

Lingala: Kikwata : Tokoyemba ba njembo na masanjoli
English: We will sing praises and worshipers

Lingala: Sakina : Pona lokumu ya NZAMBE NA BOMOYI
English: For the Glory of the LIVING GOD
